data.prayer: Father, please provide access to your Word for everyone, especially believers in Taita Taveta, Kenya.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Taita Taveta, Kenya
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Taita Taveta, Kenya know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Taita Taveta to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Taita Taveta, Kenya, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Taita Taveta, Kenya.
Father, please give the church in the state of Taita Taveta prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Taita Taveta, Kenya has a population of 284,700.

We estimate Taita Taveta has 141,223 people who might know Jesus, 86,044 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 57,433 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Taita Taveta, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
